name: The Time Traveler's Dilemma
description:
The Time Traveler's Dilemma

Premise: The player assumes the role of a time traveler who has been sent back to various eras to prevent a catastrophic event that threatens the existence of the world. The player must navigate through different time periods, each with their unique challenges and obstacles, to gather information and prevent the catastrophic event. The choices made by the player in each time period will have consequences on the outcome of the mission, and the game has multiple paths and branches. The ultimate goal of the game is to prevent the catastrophic event from occurring and ensure the survival of the world.
